author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Dr. Anthony Fauci Cautions Jim Acosta for Taking 'Soundbite' Out of Context
description: "If there was no virus in the background there was nothing to mitigate.I there was a virus there that we didn't know about, then the answer to your question is probably yes," Fauci said.
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci cautioned CNN’s Jim Acosta for taking him out of context while responding to his question at the White House press briefing on Tuesday.
Acosta asked the federal doctors if the United States could have prevented more deaths by acting to miti… [+935 chars]
